sentences.en: A cat was rubbing against my leg.
sentences.cn: 一只猫在我腿上蹭来蹭去。

sentences.en: Aargh—get that cat off the table!
Could you just give us a description of your cat?
sentences.cn: 能否请您向我们描述一下您的猫？

sentences.en: he continues to &B{play cat and mouse with} the UN inspection teams.
sentences.cn: 他继续与联合国观察团玩猫戏老鼠的把戏。

sentences.en: He had a grin on his face like a Cheshire Cat.
He picked up the cat before Rosa could protest.
sentences.cn: 未等罗莎表示异议，他就抱起了猫。

sentences.en: Her cat came up and rubbed itself against their legs.
sentences.cn: 她的猫跑上前来，在他们腿上蹭来蹭去。

sentences.en: I am allergic to cat hair.
I must look like something the cat dragged in.
sentences.cn: 我当时看上去一定很邋遢。

sentences.en: I'm too old to have a dog now. I'm a cat woman.
sentences.cn: 我太老了，养不了狗。我喜欢养猫。

sentences.en: It's a cat-and-mouse game to him, and I'm the mouse.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，这是个猫捉老鼠的把戏，而我就是老鼠。

sentences.en: It's a cat-and-mouse game to him.
sentences.cn: 对他说来，就是一场猫捉老鼠的游戏。

sentences.en: My cat Gustaf was the only thing I had—the only company.
sentences.cn: 我的猫古斯塔夫是我所有的一切——我唯一的伴侣。
斑猫/姜黄色猫/花斑家猫等

sentences.en: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.
sentences.cn: 警方跟他玩了一场精心布局的猫捉老鼠游戏，诱他落网。

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves when handling cat litter.
sentences.cn: 清理猫粪时要带上橡胶手套。

words.tran_cn: 似猫的；蹑手蹑脚的；偷偷摸摸的
斤（中国和一些东南亚国家使用的重量单位）

phrases.phrase: a cat may look at a king
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)猫也有权看国王（指即便地位低或不重要的人也有权利）

phrases.phrase: all cats are grey in the dark(或美 at night all cats
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)猫在夜晚都是灰色（将人们彼此区分的特性在某些情况下变得模糊，如果察觉不到也就没关系）
为大家的利益承担危险
（挫败对手的）一系列狡诈策略；猫戏老鼠的把戏
计算机X射线轴向分层造影扫描图
(特指夫妇)过吵闹不休的生活，像猫狗一样不和 [常与动词 lead 连用，有时作 cat-and-dog existence， fight]等
[美俚]价值低的股票；杂物；（下雨）猛烈地；大量地
[美俚]有钱有势的人；谋求特权

phrases.phrase: has the cat got your tongue?
let the cat out of the bag
like a cat on a hot tin roof(英亦作 on hot bricks)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)极为焦虑不安，心神不定，如坐针毡

phrases.phrase: like the cat that's got (或 who's stolen) the cream
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主英)（达到目的后）沾沾自喜

phrases.phrase: look like something the cat brought in
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（人）看上去很脏（或头发凌乱）

phrases.phrase: not have a cat in hell's chance
put (或 set) the cat among the pigeons
phrases.tran_cn: (英)说，做（可能引起麻烦或争执的事）

phrases.phrase: see which way the cat jumps
when (或 while) the cat's away, the mice will play
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)猫儿不在，老鼠玩得自在（指趁当权者不在，做自己喜欢做的事情）

trans.tran_en: to pretend to allow someone to do or have what they want, and then to stop them from doing or having it
to pretend to allow someone to do or have what they want, and then to stop them from doing or having it
